DOC.brief_summary: Safety performance anti-microbial vascular graft treatment aneurysmal occlusive disease abdominal aorta .
DOC.brief_title: Performance Safety Second Generation Antimicrobial Graft Abdominal Position
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose multi center , single arm study demonstrate safety performance Second Generation Anti-Microbial ( InterGard Synergy ) vascular graft treatment aneurismal occlusive disease abdominal aorta . The primary endpoint assessment primary secondary graft patency . The secondary endpoint assessment adverse event assessment triclosan silver content serum time .
DOC.criteria: Patient age 1885 year Patient present aortoiliac occlusion ( obstruction flow ) stenosis , aortoiliac aneurysm eligible revascularization bifurcate graft Patient treat emergency Patient include another investigation Patient pregnant lactate woman childbearing potential Patient know allergy material device use ( collagen , triclosan , silver ) Patient previous aortoiliac bypass replacement
